body.content:
My Dear,

Hope your week has been great!

I noticed you haven't replied to my past mail, it's fine , I know how busy
life can get.
Please pardon the abruptness of this letter. However strange or surprising
this message might seem to you as we have not met personally or had any
dealings with you in the past. I must apologize for intruding into your
privacy

God bless you abundantly as you ponder on this and respond due to my ill
health and short time.

Reply to this email account below for more updates and I humbly promise
that you will never ever regret it.
Looking forward to hearing from you sometime soon.

Sincerely,
Flora Luiz.
floraluiz99@gmail.com
